meaning_str.bing:
v. 出生；出世；出现；形成
adj. 天生（有某方面才能）的
网络. 天生的；出生的；出生于

出生；诞生；出生的；天生的；产生；出现；产生的；生来的；与生俱来的；…出身
忍受；承担；具有；（bear的过去分词）

sogou-kaoyan.v: 出生; 出现; 形成[出现9次)];以...的顺序/方式/地点所生的[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.adj: 天生的; 命中注定的[出现2次)];出生的[出现1次)]

sogou-CET4.adj: 天生的; 命中注定的[出现3次)]

sogou-gaokao.v: 出生; 出世[出现18次)];(-born)以…的顺序出生的[出现2次)]

sogou-zhongkao.adj: 天生的; 命中注定的[出现10次)]

1.en: "I thought about it a lot, honestly, " said Irving, who was born in Australia and attended high school in New Jersey.
1.cn: “老实说，关于这点我想了很多，”Irving说。这位新进球星出生在澳大利亚，并在新泽西州完成了高中学业。

2.en: When our second child was born, Jim and I thought she was perfect, but the doctor pointed out that her feet were turned inward.
2.cn: 我们的第二个孩子出生的时候，吉姆和我都曾认为她是完美无暇的，但医生却告诉我们她的脚向内弯曲。

3.en: Something mysterious is formed, born in the silent void. Waiting alone and unmoving , it is at once still and yet in constant motion.
3.cn: 寂静的虚空里诞生了一种神秘的东西，它独自守候着，毫无动静，它立刻静止了。

0.en: My mother was born before your first cities were built.
0.cn: 我妈妈出生时地球还一片荒芜。

1.en: I was born in Japan, at a military base in Okinawa.
1.cn: 我出生在日本冲绳的军事基地。

2.en: Yeah, I weighted like 27 pounds when I was born so…

3.en: Oh, yes, born alone, die alone. It's a tragic human condition.
3.cn: 当然了，孤单的出生，孤独的死去，人类就是如此悲剧。

4.en: I was their first born. They thought she was barren. It's not my fault.
4.cn: 我没出生前，他们以为她不会生。那不是我的错。

5.en: How do you know? Because I know. I was born. You were made.
5.cn: 你怎么知道？因为我就是知道，我是出生的，你是被制造出来的。

6.en: You see, he's the Prince. Apparently they had some big ceremony before I was born.
6.cn: 他是个王子，显然，他们在我出生前有个大型仪式。

7.en: Muggle? Non-magic folk. This boy's had his name down ever since you were born.
7.cn: 麻瓜？不懂魔法的人，这孩子自从你出生之前就注册了。

8.en: December 25, 1642, Julian calendar, Sir Isaac Newton is born. Jesus, on the other hand, was actually born in the summer.
8.cn: 公历1642年12月25日，艾萨克·牛顿爵士诞生，而另一方面，耶稣其实夏天出生的。

9.en: When he was born, did it ever occur to you to ask your captor to take Jack away?
9.cn: 他出生之后，你...你有没有想过让囚禁你的人把杰克送走？

10.en: Sons of Adam. Cain was the first man to be born. Abel, the first to die.
10.cn: 他们是亚当的儿子，该隐是世上第一个出生的人，而亚伯却是第一个死的人。

11.en: I mean I, well I think I can figure it out. I guess you know I was born, and everyone started lying their asses off.
11.cn: 我猜想得到我出生之后，大家都开始撒谎了。

12.en: Come up here, daughter. Look how tall she is. She's been taller than me since the day she was born.
12.cn: 过来，闺女，看她多高，从她出生那天起她就比我高了。

13.en: You were born at midnight. I was Pharaoh, and I had seen wonders most men only dream of.
13.cn: 你出生在午夜。我是法老，我见过的奇观，多数人只在梦里见过。

14.en: Sometimes, I think I'm cursed. 'Cause of something that happened before I was even born.
14.cn: 有时候，我觉得自己被诅咒了，这个诅咒源于我出生前发生的一些事。

15.en: Yeah, did she sound happy about it? Because my friend Ethel's baby was born with a teeny-tiny beard.
15.cn: 她听起来口气高不高兴？我有个朋友的孩子刚出生就有点胡子。

16.en: Three are Saudis? Here legally on F-1 student visas. Yasin Said was born in Michigan.
16.cn: 三名沙特人？他们持F1学生签证合法入境，亚辛·赛义德出生在密歇根州。

17.en: Pammy? Oh, yes. Listen, Nick, when she was born, Tom was God knows where, with God knows whom.
17.cn: 你说帕米？是的。尼克，她出生的时候天知道汤姆在哪和谁鬼混在一起。

18.en: Okay, so we get born. We learn to walk and talk. We meet our friends. Then what? You know.
18.cn: 很好，我们出生了。然后学会了走路和说话。遇见了朋友，然后呢？你懂的。

19.en: Uncle's most precious, born in the Year of the Monkey. That's why you're so clever, precious and clever.
19.cn: 舅舅最珍贵的小宝贝，猴年出生，所以你才如此聪慧，珍贵且聪慧。
